EmailTemplate.description: [External] November 2018 Honeywell Service Bulletin labor claims inquiry.
EmailTemplate.name: Contract Claims_Warranty
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} , {!Case.Subject}, {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re glad to hear from you!
Thanks for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. We’ve already started working on your {!Case.Subject} . Here’s your unique tracking number: {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c} .You can use this number to track our progress.
We’ll connect all of your inquiry details through the subject line of this email. So, please leave the subject line unchanged, should you reply, to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Your inquiry will be reviewed and analyzed in a FIFO (First In First Out) basis. If additional information is required we will contact you.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
